live_updates: This issue has been resolved. Thank you for your patience.
Our technicians will work to repair services through the night. We apologize for the extended disruption.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
34715.summary: Some customers in the Valley Ridge area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
34715.title: Mar 8 – Calgary (Valley Ridge) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
